content.rendered: Los Valores Cuentan!©️ Trustworthiness, Respect, Responsibility, Fairness, Caring, and Citizenship will be pillar principles this year. We are TRRFCC people! We’re back and ready for the new school year at LASIS! This week, we had the pleasure of hosting Dr. Gary Smit and William Pulgarin of Character Counts!©️, who shared valuable information about this program with our Teachers and Staff.
